dmca.title: [ABUSE] Fw: Regarding your hosting
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, December 05, 2005 9:48 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Policy Enforcement
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Fw: Regarding your hosting


For your review.

Martin Gaston
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Begin forwarded message:

> From: "Pal \(VIP Records\)" <piracy@viprecords.co.uk>
> Date: December 5, 2005 4:15:26 AM CST
> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
> Subject: [ABUSE] Fw: Regarding your hosting
>
> Hi,
>
> This is Pal from VIP Records.
>
> You have a website hosted with you guys which is allowing illegally 
> downloadable albums through a package called Torrent.
>
> We have just released an album - Bikram Singh - American Jugni.
>
> This website has uploaded this, i have provided a screen shot. I 
> contacted the website prior to release but nothing has been done.
>
> Here are the details of the website:
>
>      Host       : desitorrents.com
>      IP Address : 70.86.138.194
>
> We are members of the BPI and we will be passing on the details to 
> them if this site is not dealt with. We kindly request for this link 
> to be removed.
>
> this is the direct link:
>
> http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/showthread.php?t=78483
>
> I work for many labels such as Easylife Records and Nachural Records - 
> It has so many albums up for illegal downloading. If Bikram Singh is 
> not removed i will be contacting these labels aswell - As it has 
> material from each label on the website.
>
> Could you please take immediate action against this server or the BPI 
> will be contacted monday morning.
> Thank you for all your help
> Regards,
> Pal
>
> VIP Records Limited
> email: piracy@viprecords.co.uk
> website: www.viprecords.co.uk
>
> *******************************************************
> NOTE: The information in this email is confidential and may be legally 
> privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not read, 
> use or disseminate that information. Please notify the sender. This 
> e-mail is provided for general information purposes only. For the 
> avoidance of doubt the contents of this email will not constitute a 
> legally binding contract.
>
> Any opinions or advice contained in this email are not necessarily 
> those of VIP Record Limited. Although this email and any attachments 
> are believed to be free of any virus, or any other defect which might 
> affect any computer or IT system into which they are received and 
> opened, it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that they 
> are virus free and no responsibility is accepted by VIP Records 
> Limited for any loss or damage arising in any way from receipt or use 
> thereof. Further information on VIP Records Limited can be found at 
> www.viprecords.co.uk
> ********************************************************
>
>
